structure.matter
Class Molecule

java.lang.Object
  structure.matter.Molecule
Direct Known Subclasses:
AminoAcid, CrossLinker, SmallMolecule
public abstract class Molecule
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract class representing chemical molecules.

Since:
0.1
Version:
0.1
Author:
Abdullah Kahraman

Constructor Summary
Molecule(AtomList atomList)
          Connects all atoms in this molecule with Bond objects that are non-metal ions and have a distance smaller than the van der Waals radii of both atoms + PDB uncertainty factor.

Constructor Detail

Molecule

public Molecule(AtomList atomList)
Connects all atoms in this molecule with Bond objects that are non-metal ions and have a distance smaller than the van der Waals radii of both atoms + PDB uncertainty factor.

Parameters:
atomList - - List of Atoms that are building up the molecule.
Method Detail

getBonds

public final java.util.ArrayList<Bond> getBonds()
Returns all bonds found within this molecule.

Returns:
ArrayList object with elements of type Bond.

setElement

public final void setElement()
Determines the element type of the atom by comparing the atom name in a PDB file with the periodic table element symbol of the same atom. If the atom is of type calcium Ca, than the molecule argument must either be null, or has 0 or 1 element. Furthermore, if special atom types such as hydrogens bound to oxygens shall be recognized, the hydrogens and their covalent bound atoms must have instances within the bond parameter of this molecule object. Element types that are dependent on aromaticity need first an aromaticity assignment.

double value value representing this amino acid's total SAS.
